attributes.action: ask Dr Who to lend us the Tardis to take the country to the day after the next election immediately when this government will have been put out of its misery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please could the PM ask Dr Who to take us in the tardis to May and the day after the election when he will already have been put out of his dithering misery. This has been made clear by his reply to the 'resign now' petition which is a load of vacuous twaddle and confirms his status as a human desert of ideas apart from the tawdry ability to jerk his knee at whichever reality television star he thinks needs name checking in a feeble attempt at being a 'bloke' of the people but actually just succeeds in clarifying how utterly out of touch he is with the real issues of the day.

Cue music... diddly diddly diddly, diddly diddly diddly diddly, woo oooh...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
